name: io.github.GabrielaHdzMicrosoft/mcp-server
description: An MCP server that provides visual memory and context storage with knowledge graph capabilities

environmentVariables.description: Path to the memory.json file for knowledge graph storage
environmentVariables.name: MEMORY_FILE_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of directories the server can access, or JSON array format
environmentVariables.name: ALLOWED_DIRECTORIES
